text: U re abele tsohle tse lokileng lefats’eng lena le ho Bo-tlang! Re boetse ho uena”. Eaba Allah U re: “Ka kotlo ea Ka Ke otla ope eo Ke ikhethetseng eena, mohau oa ka O aparetse lintho tsohle, e bile ona mohau oo Ke tla O abela ba etsang botle le ba fanang ka linyehelo, le bohle ba kholoang lits’enolong tsa Rona
